Title: Valerie Solanas Died for Your Sins: Scumbag
Writer: Ryan Murphy (created by), Brad Falchuk (created by), Crystal Liu
Actors: Sarah Paulson, Evan Peters, Cheyenne Jackson, Billie Lourd
Plot: Kai begins to solidify his grasp in power; Bebe Babbitt, the former lover of the first female cult leader Valerie Solanas, warns Beverley, Ivy, and Winter about Kai.
